text:
Seasonal Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average, SARIMA or Seasonal ARIMA, is an
extension of ARIMA that explicitly supports univariate time series data with a seasonal
component. It adds three new hyperparameters to specify the autoregression (AR), diï¬€erencing
(I) and moving average (MA) for the seasonal component of the series, as well as an additional
parameter for the period of the seasonality.
A seasonal ARIMA model is formed by including additional seasonal terms in the
